name: ZNAKE (ZX Spectrum)
description:
ZNAKE is a very simple Snake/Worm/Nibbles - like game for the ZX Spectrum. It is my very first complete retro-game, coded back in 2005 in C and built with z88dk.

Within the Retro Snake Game Jam, held in 2023, I took the opportunity to revamp the project and clean up the program, in order to remove some redundancies and make the code compatible with more recent z88dk version.

You can either play ZNAKE online (powered by JSSpeccy 3) or download it (source code is included).

Controls are: q: up, a: down, o: left, p: right.
